item.title: ADM
item.description: score:87 Chances: Global agricultural exports reached a historic high in 2022, surpassing $2 trillion for the first time, representing a 7.4% increase Archer-Daniels-Midland Company (ADM) announced an accelerated share repurchase agreement to buy back $1 billion of its common stock Full-Year Earnings Show Resilience Despite Market Pressures Risks: Starch makers in Europe have slowed production as a drop in demand and cheap imports from Asia leave them with excess capacity News of an investigation into ADM’s accounting practices caused the company to lose more than $8 billion in value Score:87 chances characters count - risks characters count = 87
